resources.string:
Discover places that revolves around your 
interests and social network. Save the ones that 
call out to you strongly and organise them nicely 
into your itineraries at a later time.

String an itinerary from a fellow Stringer and 
continue to personalise it from there; Add new 
places that you've discovered and remove those 
that do not appeal to you.
Share experiences and be \npart of the String community

If you benefited from itineraries that you've 
strung, share the love; Contribute and share your 
personal experiences and feedback with fellow 
Stringers, as you learn from them too. After all, 
community is unity!
Enter your email address below and follow the \ninstructions in the email we’ll send you.
A verification email has been sent to:
Check your email and click on the verification link \nto activate your account.
Select at least 3 tags that represents your \ninterests
Add some suggested users from the comunity
Be in the know whenever you \nreceive messages, new followers \nand more
Share your location to help us \nfind the best places near you
